Dead by Daylight - это кооперативный survival horror с видом от первого или третьего лица (смотря за кого играть).
+Атмосфера
+Интересные стороны
+Сами ощущения игры за обоих классов
Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой.
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа.
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге.
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок.
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому.
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби.
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка.
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цену.
         10 Повешенных человек из 10 =D
игра понравилась много возможностей выбора героев прокачка перков у каждого маньяка свои способности
Alguien me puede ayudar porfavor, cada vez que salgo del juego se me reinicia el nivel y todo, no se como arreglarlo

Поиграв 3 часа в эту игору, я понял вот что...
+++++++++++++++++++++
+Очень атмосферно(особенно ночью, когда маньяк ударяет тебя в спину становится очково!)
+Графон не плохой, очень мрачно.
+Интересно играть что за маняка что за выжившего.
+Баланс не плохой но и не идеальный ( лично я играл за убийцу с пилой, так он в начале игры может добежать на спидах сразу к выжившим)
------------------------------
-Нет нормальной возможности играть с друзьями(из за этого скучно играть одному)
-Мелкие баги ( играя за убийцу, не смог поднять жертву)
-Мало режимов для игры (скучновато играть в один режим)
-Нет возможности поменять управление(ну или я даун))
-Пока что не сильно оптимизированна(хотя на моем ноуте потянула на минималках 30 FPS)

Еще просто напишу то что тут есть какая-то одежда но она пока дефолтовая, ждем других шмоток.
И перки пока что не понятно что делают, в игре как то не заметно(

В общем итог:

*Графика - 8.5/10
*Геймплей - 9.5/10
*Звук - 8/10
*Мультиплеер 2/10 (его почти нет)
--------------------------
Общая оценка 7/10
--------------------------

I was skeptical but again was very suprised at this game. I have had so much fun playing this game, I am excited what they will update and put in the game (because much is needed). For the value, its worth it, the players you meet and the amount of excitement out of it has left me more than pleased with this product. For those who love not only horror but playing with your friends, this game is where its at.

I'm not really liking it. It might be because, as the killer, the players try to taunt you and aren't really scared. That makes the magic of it all kind of fade. Performance wise my computer isn't all that great to begin with, but seeing how the level is small, and the graphics are okay I just thought I would have a smoother experience. Then again it might just be network issues I have. The price is fair. There is no pay to win scheme. I'm going to have to try this again later when I have more patience but right now I feel let down with this game. It's like a lot of evil stuff but just not scary. Like I feel weird for playing it but also bored. Yeah.. cannot recommend at this point.

!ПЕРЕД ПРОЧТЕНИЕМ КУПИТЬ И НАЧАТЬ УСТАНОВКУ ИГРЫ!
Ну вот, то самое "что-то новенькое". 
Я редко могу рекомендовать что-то на 100%,но это как раз та игра из серии "должно быть у каждого".
Сразу скажу, оптимизация на высоте и летает на ульта даже на ноуте, а графика реально хороша, во всяком случае атмосферна, звук так же хорош и атмосферен. Звук в игре играет роль не меньше чем в "контр стайк", и это радует.
Игра может не хардкор но явно не простенький стимулятор ходьбы.
Ладно, что же за игра? ЭТО БЛЯТЬ ТО ЧТО ТЫ ХОТЕЛ СМОТРЯ ФИЛЬМЫ УЖАСОВ.
"Не ходи в тот темный подвал"-говорил ты смотря очередную техаскую резню бензопилой.
В этой игре играя за "выживших" ты как раз окунешься в роль жертвы и будешь делать то,что посчитаешь нужным,- искать таварищей, убегать, чинить, чуствовать себя куском мяса на крюке и прятаться в страхе.
СТОП,ты смеешься над маньяками в фильмах? Так бери в руки 2х метровый тесак и попробуй сделать из 4 игроков отбивные.
О гемплее советую все же узнать поиграв лично. Арсенал пока не велик но хорош, 3 маньяка, 4 жертвы и 3 карты, куча перков и скилов,но я думаю скоро пойдут длц и обновы которые добавят как персонажей так и косметику,что я буду ждать.
I recommend the game... a great stride BDI, does need to be thought out better though but they are on it they hear our pleads and everything will be fixed very soon
Dead By Daylight is very good.
Awesome game! Give them some time and most smaller issues will get fixed.

Pq a empressa nao coloca um sistema de ban pelo id do processador, ai este fdp tem q gastar dinheiro comprando outro.

First off, it is a great and fun game to play as both roles. There is no problem to the gameplay but
the client is pretty bad at the moment. If you are only willing to play this game to play with a friend
or two, don't buy this game.... yet. Hopefuly they will add this feature since this game would be amazing
to play with a friend and have a skype call with them and have fun. The lobby system is also not
that great because it takes pretty long to wait for the lobby to fill up but if you don't care about
that and you can just alt tab while you wait, then buy it. The gameplay is perfectly fine (with little bugs that
i yet have to encounter) but it would be nice to adjust the client itself.
可玩性中等，不能和好友一起当生存者匹配是个缺点，屠夫有点小变态，对电脑要求野有点高，家里的小本本开低效都只能有20多帧

Если бы эта игра работала идеально, то от нее можно было бы получать удовольствие в течение часов 5, после этого она успеет надоесть в конец, так как геймплей крайне однообразный.
Но игра работает далеко не идеально. Если играть за маньяка, то в этом случае вы создаете лобби, игроки набираются относительно долго, но терпимо.
Если играть за жертву, то тут какой-то кошмар, уже на этапе подключения. Вам кучу раз напишет "failed to join", после чего вы подождете парочку загрузок, с возвращением в начальное меню, после чего вы может быть и присоеденитесь к игре.
В игре куча багов. Я поиграл часа полтора, 3, считая попытки подключиться, и уже  насытился ими досыта.
Баги в духе ранних преальфа подделий. Наример мою жертву сняли с крюка и она осталась в крюке, то есть просто сквозь человека торчит столб от крюка, при этом с ним невозможно ничего сделать, при попытке ударить, я бью столб, а  человек в асболютной безопасности.

Геймплей недоработан и скучноват. Жертва может вечно бегать от маньяка, если в ближайщей досутпности два окна, а такое бывает часто.
За саму игру, идею и реализацию 5/10.
За ее техническую составляюую refund/10.

It's like playing overly agressive hide and seek with that disabled kid back in primary school that nobody wanted to touch because he was kinda weird and walked funny.

Game's very nice, Some people believe it to be unbalanced but it's infact very balanced with the asymetrical view of the survivors and killer, and the items and perks of more.

If there was probably one thing that bothered me, It'd had have to be one of the killers called the Wraith.

The Wraith can go invisible with the bell item and either wait/hunt down the survivors, (the bell does not have a time limit). Invisibility's a pretty op kinda thing and almost sort of unbalances the odds a little, The bell or the movement speed of the Wraith should be tinkered/nerfed to balance it up a little more.
Turn on generator simulator 10/10 amazingly realistic, as He-Man would say "I have the power"

TL;DR [b] Game is unfinished. Wait till devs update the game before buying[/b]

As much as I love the concept of the game, the implementation by the devs isn't well done.

 If you are planning to buy this game but are from outside of USA, [b]don't buy the game[/b]

The game is using a peer to peer gaming connection. [b]Your ping is all based on the Host(Killer) location.[/b] There are no methods for the player to filter the lobbies to suit your region nor server lists to find a decent game.

[b]Optmization of the game[/b] is bad as well. There are little to none configuration options. No key rebinding nor in-depth visual/audio menu. Only the basics.


[b]Balance.[/b] The game consist of 1 Killer and 4 Survivor. Players will have to find generators around the map, fix them in order to escape. However, [b] if 1 of the survivor disconnect, you are facing an up hill battle.[/b] There are no modifiers nor compensation for having less than 4 survivors even though the game is balance around 4 capable players. You can only pray that the killer is a 7 year old

Planning to buy the game and team up with your friends to survive the killer together? NOPE. There are [b]no party system in the game.[/b] The only way for you to play with your friends is to create a private game and to have a fair game, you must have 5 people playing it.

Très bon jeux. Il a une très bonne ambiance du fait du décor, des music et ect...
Ceux jeux vous permetra  de joué de 2 façon différente :
-Le tueur : qui joue à la première personne et qui doit tuer les survivant en les sacrifiant. Et il y a 3 type de tueur : 
Le piégeur qui utile des piège à ours. Très bien si vous voulez trouver les joueurs tout en les attendent à des endroit précis.
Un mec à la troncauneuse qui lui, comme on peut le devenier, à un troncauneuse qui lui permet de rush et de one shoot les survivant.
Et puis le spectre qui peut se mettre invisible. Si vous aimer être un sournois (ou un connard tout dépend du point de vue :))  il est fait pour vous.

Puis il y a les survivant :  qui eux doivent s'échaper en réactivant des génarateurs qui perment d'ouvrir les portes.
Il y a 4 personnages mais comparé au tueur ils peuvent avoir la même chose mais pas dans le même ordre.

爱拔插的迅雷屠夫，五台跑的开挂人类。
幻神太强，走地太弱，修机太快，孝子太多。
幻神我唯唯诺诺，走地我重拳出击；追逐我唯唯诺诺，守尸我重拳出击。
恐慌超载不让修，今天谁都不许走；魂牵手电大光头，谁能把我人皇留。
这样我还是推荐的，因为真的很好玩。

Dead by Daylight - это игра, в которой вам никогда не помогут ваши тиммейты. Вас ранил киллер? Да чуваку с набором медика поx*й на вас и ваши ранения. Вас поймали? Так вот же рядом пробегает чувак с фонариком, и вы уже рады, что вот вот вас спасут, ослепив киллера, а нет, он просто мимо бежал. Даже когда вы весите на крюке, и вот вот уйдёте из этого мира, ваши тиммейты делают, что бы вы думали? Правильно, чинят генераторы.

Nous étions rassemblés dans une forêt sombre, à quatre. Pourquoi ? Je ne saurais dire mais il fallait sortir d’ici, et rapidement.
Nous avons trouvé des générateurs qui alimentent une porte électrique qui nous permettrait de sortir mais les générateurs étaient éteints, il fallait les réactiver.
Nous nous séparâmes pour gagner en efficacité mais maintenant, j’étais seul, seul face à une menace inconnue qui m’observait. Je naviguai entre les arbres espérant trouver un générateur à activé quand soudain, une explosion retentit, un de mes compagnon d’infortune a du faire une erreur avec le générateur…
J’en trouva un moi-même et commença les réparations…mais quelque chose n’allait pas, j’avais l’impression de sentir un souffle rauque dans mon cou…quelqu’un m’observait, caché, mon rythme cardiaque s’accéléra …Il fallait fuir, vite…
Trop tard, je senti le coup de machette dans mon dos et m’effondrai sur le sol dans un hurlement de douleur. Le tueur m’attrapa et m’emporta plus loin. Je tentai par tous les moyens de m’échapper mais rien n’y fit, il me pendit à un crochet. Cette douleur…inhumaine…des crochets démoniaques…dans le cœur…la mort…j’espère que mes compagnons parviendront à s’échapper car il vient vers eux dans un grognement venu des enfers… 

[U] un jeu asymetrique [/U]
Jeu de Starbreeze, créateurs de Payday 1 & 2, Dead by Daylight propose un match entre 4 survivants qui doivent s’échapper et un tueur qui doit sacrifier les survivants à une espèce d’entité démoniaque. Le jeu est passionnant et bien stressant en survivant. La bande son joue un grand rôle dans le jeu, elle prévient quand le tueur est proche et donc qu’il est temps de filer. Niveau graphismes, rien d’extraordinaire, au contraire, c’est plutôt moche et sombre (mais ça c’est cohérent avec la thématique).

[U] Un jeu aux finitions brutes [/U]
Le jeu est pas mal buggé de mon coté (bug de collisions, impossibilité de ramasser un survivant, …). Le système de matchmaking est pourri du trognon, en Peer2peer et ce n’est que le tueur qui Host, donc si le tueur déco, partie terminée et vous êtes bons pour recommencer. A corriger au plus vite !

[U] Un jeu pour des amis psychokwak [/U]

Il est clair que c’est le genre de jeu qui se savoure bien plus entre amis qu’avec des inconnus et même si, avec des randoms, la tension est toujours là et que la partie reste stressante et prenante, avec des amis, la puissance du fun est démultipliée. Entre le mec qui fait une voix de malade, le type qui hurle « merde il m’a eu le c……. » « aide-moi T….. d…. C…., hey te barre pas reviens§§§§§ », quelles belles tranches de rigolades. À conseiller principalement à ceux qui savent rassembler quelques potes. Les parties sont courtes (20 minutes maxi), on peut faire une partie rapidos et passer à autre chose.
[U] What Else ? [/U]

-	3 tueurs assez différents 
-	Un système de progression pour les tueurs et les survivants 
-	Une génération procédurale des objets sur la map (même map mais objets placés aléatoirement).
-	Bande son qui claque sa mère
-	Prix hyper raisonnable pour ce qu’il offre (20 €)
-	Traduit en français mais buggé (textes qui s’affichent parfois en anglais)
-	…
Une recommandation ! je ne dis pas que j’y jouerai 60 heures mais les 5-6 heures jouées ont été super fun, je vais donc y jouer encore un bon moment

Ok, lets do a simple little review. 

pos 

1 its fun.
2 Can be scary sometimes
3 Nice atmosphere
4 Ranks/leveling
5 Addictive(cant stop playing it)

neg

1 No party matchmaking
2 Ranks Broken when you auto escape. you lose one point
3 Wraith its a little bit op. need tweaking
4 matchmaking is a little bit funky. failed to join game etc.
5 variety, only 4 chars/ need atleast 8
6. No Keyboard Remap/ your stuck with WASD. (use AutoHotkey)

All for all it is good, but in theory they should not of released it as is, they should of waited a few months got the bugs out then released it, then all of them negs would be gone.

Dont get me wrong its fun and very addictive.

Its cheap so why not pick it up and give it a go if you dont like it refund is your friend..

So... I bought this game yesterday and my first impression is that the game is hella fun. It still needs some work of course, but you should expect that from a game on release day. You get the option of playing as one of 4 survivors, each with their own special abilities to repair enough generators to power up an escape door. Or play as the killer to find, hack n slash, and sacrifice as many of the survivors as possible before they escape. I can see this game going far in it's future, and many other games to follow in it's footsteps. Much, much fun!!

I feel very neutral about this game but I'm giving it a thumbs up because I see potiental. Though the first 8 hours of gameplay I expiernced massive lag issues, bugs which broke the game, and glitches that would make me have to force close my game. In all this is a very unique game and has a very good potiental. I hope the dev's don't turn into money grabbers and try to just sell a terrible unfinished product. I hope that within 3 months most issues will be fixed and having a lobby with one friend then match making is possible. Also maybe some up with some communication system within the game, not a chat box, maybe something like a gesture wheel where you can indicate certin things to your team members quietly. In all I hope this becomes a very great game because I quite enjoy it even though it's unfinished.

[h1] Representation [/h1]
Playing as the survivor the game offers an intensely dark atmosphere with surroundings that look beautiful at ultra settings. When you're sneaking through the thick grass that moves when you crouch through it, and you hear your heartbeat (in-game) rise, you will feel that pressure and anxiety induced by the killer yourself. As the killer, the atmosphere changes due to tunnel vision of the first person view, making stalking and ultimately killing a thrilling hunt.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
It is hard to comment on the balance of the 4v1 so soon after release. 
The survivors are challenged with fixing the generators in order to open the electric powered fence to freedom, while escaping the grasp of the killer. The killer's goal is to slash his four victims twice, and then carrying them to sacrificial poles spread throughout the level. The game (and it's balance) largely depends on what the remaining 3 survivors are doing during the time that the killer is  hunting one of them. If they act smart and fix generators during that time, balance will be in favour of the survivors (numbers game). If they however slack, the killer's chances will grow with every survivor that is impaled. This is because a set number of generators must be activated before the gate can be opened, making a sole survivor's chances very slim.

The main problem lies within the game's ranking system. Both the survivors and the killer benefit greatly and perhaps [i] only [/i] by lenghty games. As it is now, you can kill all 4 survivors within 2 minutes of a game (truly outplaying them) and lose a rank because you did not score enough points. This means that winning or losing a game is not a requirement for gaining or losing rank, which in essence can be good, but not the way it's implemented currently.

[h1] Overall [/h1]
I think that the game as it is makes for a thrilling and addicting experience. The minor bugs and/or ranking issues are things that can be dealt with easily within the first few weeks so I'm not worried there. If you have the $$ (18 euro) around, don't hesitate to buy and try this wonderful game.

Good couple of changes they have made throughout the life-span of this game. Having more fun than ever playing it.

Great game so far. Overall the concept is great. The feeling of being in a Friday the 13th-esque game will make this a must for when anyone busts out their horror movie and game binge in October. The tutorials covered very basic subjects about the game and seemed to have missed an opportunity to explain the strategy required for higher levels in the bloodweb. Although it has a manual that links you to a more informative webpage, it seems a more thorough coverage of all the mechanics in the game with well flushed vids.

The lobby still needs tweaking due to all the players that drop and cause the lobby to break. It has been known to just sit in a lobby and have people pop in and out over a 10-15min wait. Not sure if this is due to very impatient people or unstable server connections.

Not sure how I feel about the bloodpoint mechanics yet. Some games there is a real challenge between teams and you can score a good chunk of change, sometimes roughly evenly for everyone. In some other games I would be able to catch 2-3 players and hook them within 2-5 mins of the game, play cat-and-mouse with the 3rd or last man just to have them camp the hatch and end up with a lemons worth of points while the last survivor leaves loaded.

I really like the character progression and ranking system, so much so that it was rough to continue playing in the beta due to the lvl 6 cap. Which tells me that even if i were to reach an amazing rank i would not see the benefit so much if this resets every month. At that point you would really need other friends to play this to continue on. I feel that this is the problem with the 4v1 game genre as no one dev team that i know of really apply a solo campaign. Its nice that they left some lore on their webpage and in bits and pieces throughout the bloodweb, but where is the emersion in that? Seems to be the games greatest strength & weakness.

As for me I love the game. I played about 20 hours on record during the beta. Honestly though, this game runs worse than the beta. 

1. No Party System. (Devs mentioned bringing it in a future update)
2. The Rank System is HORRIBLE! If the monster disconnects, you lose rank! WHAT!? At least make it to where we dont lose rank at all. Moreover, the ranking system is WAY more buffed compared to the beta. You literally have to do ALL 4 categories to get a pip (white tear drop under your rank). 
3. No VOIP. 
4. Game has too many bugs to be considered a full release imo. Should've came out as early access, but what do i know? I'M A BETA TESTER!

Other than that, I love the game. Definetly something different from what i'm use to play. Considering how much showtime it's gotten on twitch/youtube, the devs would be STUPID not to keep this game updated.

Patch #2 came out! Balances/fixes/etc.... Too bad it messed up the matchmaking. Couldn't get a match as either survivor or killer. The devs even posted that they were going to stream the new patch LOL. Good luck!.


July 28th 2016: 

Patch #4 came out. Fixed infine jukes (most of them). Now ppl are complaining, because now they can't survive. WHAT!? Are you kidding me? So that tells me that they're were the ones who were using the infine jukes, because they're garbage at surviving. 

Now, if the killer DC's, survivors lose a pip! YAY! BACK TO SQUARE 1! I love this game to death, but I can't stand the whole back and forth with it. Love-Hate relationship. What kills me about this game (no pun intended) is the ppl who play the killer. WHY THE FUCK DO YOU HAVE TO CAMP HOOKS? ESPECIALLY IN THE BASEMENT!?!?!? The killer community is garbage. They get their 1st kill,camp,survivor dies, goes kill someone else, repeat. 

Now in this patch, if the killer DC's cause they're garbage at finding survivors, survivors loses a pip! WHOOOOOOOO! I honestly don't care about playing for rank, I play for fun. I honestly can't do that with this game. Not even the game's fault, it's the ppl who play it.

I'm really on the fence about whether to give this game a positive review or not. But it's fun enough that I will give a thumbs up. I played the BETA so the hours I show as game time played are not entirely accurate.

Pros
-Great, fun, fast paced arcade style gameplay gets you in and out of the action quick. Kind of game you could play for hours, or hop on for like thirty minutes
-Character designs are great, think everyone looks really cool
-Great atmosphere and an ambiguous supernatural mythology to it

Cons
-A bit repetitive (but it's fun repetitive so I don't mind too much)
-Wraith is an OP piece of garbage, don't let anyone tell you otherwise; if they are defending Wraith, they're probably the kind of chump to use Wraith and only Wraith
-The blood web leveling system seems not totally thought out. Things you gain are random which adds some variety to the mix, but it doesn't feel like you can really BUILD a class like the Dev Diary videos claimed, you more just get what you get in a hodgepodge sort of jumbled class
-Apparently there are already pathetic hack-gamers who have no real talent and apparently only find fun in something when they're ruining it for everyone else.

Overall: 20 bucks? The price is right, cause it IS loads of fun, but a little repetitive and be ready to get frustrated by other gamers who exploit OP characters and use hacks to suck the fun out of it.

I rarely write reviews for games but this game is VERY addicting. To make this review simple I'm going to write it as pros and cons. 

PROS:

*Can be a killer or survivor

*Rarely run into a group of friends who have an extreme advantage with communication if you're the killer

*Quick learning curve

*Infinite level perks

*Maps are random every round so survivors can't memorize layouts

CONS:

*Has a few bugs, has crashed once for me

*Can only make a lobby as a killer (Good and bad depending on how you look at it)

*Loose items on death (If you buy an item for your character such as a medkit for example, if you die while using that item it is gone for good until you are able to buy another one)

Other than what I listed, the game is very good. It has a few balancing issues but that's expected from a game that just released. Give it time and the game will be amazing. The best round I had was when I was the wraith and I went invisible, the survivors didn't notice so when I found them I uncloaked and caught them all in one spot. I know this review isn't much but I hope it is enough to sway some people to trying the game. The negative reviews claiming the game doesn't have private friend matches are trolls and people that want to sit under their friends buts the whole time while playing. Loosen up, play the dang game like it was meant to be played. If you want to play with your friends start a private match so its fair between YOUR FRIENDS. lol
Awesome game to play with friends! :D

6月14日，这个游戏发布了，本打算入的，但是当时纠结了一下，然后今天早上入的游戏吧，怎么说呢，其实我很喜欢类似《致命弯道》，《隔山有耳》之类的一群大学生作死遇到变态杀人狂的电影的，所以我对着游戏所抱的期望还是很高的，但是进游戏之后我发现，其实这游戏不管从哪个角度来说，还是很好的，但是当我点开设置界面的时候，少的可怜的设置，和不细节的设置，令我感到蛋蛋的忧伤，我心想，无所谓，反正玩的是变态杀人狂和幸存者的游戏，那就进去吧，进去之后我发现我的三观颠覆了，完全没搞懂，各种莫名其妙，各种不理解- - ，完全不是我心里的那种变态杀人狂和手无缚鸡之力的幸存者啊，所以只能默默的退款了，希望游戏能越做越好，有一天让我回归。

嗯~~~~怎么说呢，昨天重新购买了这个游戏，相对于以前来说，挺不错的，最起码官方中文出来了，而且优化什么的都很好，但是希望模式不要那么单一。
Dangerously fun - some initial bugs and problems in the first couple days.  Game could improve drastically with the ability ot make custom or private lobbies instead of random chance

Okay, so this game is FUN. But... devs, my dear devs. Listen to what I'm about to say.

So you got your game out before Friday the 13th and Last Year, both games aiming to sort of do what you're doing here, great! You got the advantage of being released first, now you gotta make sure you hold on to first place.

-First of all, and you knew this one was coming, allow friends to queue with eachother. I understand you not wanting to create an unfair advantage, but allow at least 3 friends to queue. If they're with a group of 4, the private match option is still there, and it can be done with 3 survivors, but any less is simply no good.
(The worst part of this is it has the side-effect of lobbies filling up with people looking for their friends, and then leaving again. Lobbies take way, WAY longer to start because of this, and that is aggravating.)

-Secondly, the benny hill theme worthy window hopping. It does not only upset the killer and makes him feel the game is treating him 'unfair', but removes the 'fear' survivors should feel. Now I am specifically talking about windows, the pellets are breakable and thus can be removed by the killer and are not the issue. But being able to keep the killer at bay indefinitely is not the way to go about this. I suggest either one of two mechanics:
[list]
  [*]After 3 or so jumps over the window in a short period of time, the vaulting starts to go slower, and if they keep doing it, slow them down even more. This will keep you thinking of your escape, increasing the survivor's fear of the killer instead of feeling you can 'outsmart' him. You gotta stop vaulting, make a run and hide sometime!
  [*]This is a more heavy-handed 'fix' and I do not like it. Give killers the ability to let the entity cover one window (this has to be channeled), it will remain until the killer decides to put it unto another window.

These are my suggestions to you, the first part DEFINITELY needs fixing because like I said, it creates issues for people actually trying to just start the game.

I have recently seen a lot of reviews complaining about the state of this game and I thought I'd take it upon myself to clear some things up for those of you who are unsure. (Those looking for balancing explanations go to second paragraph)
The concept of this game is simple but effective, a killer is among 4 other survivors on the map, he must hunt and kill the survivors before they active all 5 generators; i wont go into any more details seen as though most of you already know this. 
The game has many things going for it, the atmosphere is great, the feeling of the killer chasing you is shocking but satisfying when you evade them and/or escape to the end. The game features a lot of things that allow it to stay fresh and interesting, 1 of which includes a tool box which allows you to dismantle hooks around the procedurally generated map, these exclude the hooks that are placed in the basement as they are permanent (to allow the killer to actually hook somebody instead of them all being destroyed). The game allows you to keep your item if you escape with it in your hand which I personally think is an amazing feature and really makes sense, the equipment/item also has add-ons which help/increase its use such as allowing the tool box to last longer giving it more uses, or i creating its speed. Perks also in the game (permanent) give it a very unique style of gameplay, allowing you to change the way you play around them, an example would be a certain perk allows the skill check on generators to be larger if you can sense (through heartbeat) the hunter making it easier to land, others allow you to dodge traps or even seen the hunters location for a short amount of time after all the generators are open. This parred with a few other features (that i don't want to go into detail about) make the gave very exciting and somewhat different every time.

Onto the balancing and complaints. Many MANY people have complained about the lack of a party system or communication in-game (there is the ability to talk in the lobby just before the game start to fellow survivors (hunter cannot see the messages) incase you have a few words of wisdom or plans you wanted to tell them), of course this is appalling on the developers behalf, there is reason why this feature is not in the game YET; the hunter works off of the survivors lacking each-others whereabouts until they are caught, this means its more of a "hunting" style rather than chasing a school of fish that disperse when you go near them. As for the party system, same reason - 4 people can simply work together and out-play the hunter giving them an EASY advantage as if they are good players they will be able to communicate their location AND the hunters, making his perks such as 0 heartbeat radius completely useless as it requires the hunter to stand still for 4 or so seconds to be off the radar and if 1 survivor see's them, they can just tell the others he is there and nobody will fall for that trap or that style of play making the perk close to useless and no fun at all. The lack of party system also means that massive amount of points cannot be farmed by 2 friends, i wont say how this is possible incase people find lobbies together and exploit it, but it is simple and possible with just 1 other friend with you (even if you aren't the killer). 

NOTE: The developers have actually said they will add this feature soon into the game for hunters that WANT a larger challenge with survivors that can communicate and/are friends, this will also be a ranked type of game mode once they release the ranked game mode to make matches more even based on your survivor/killer rank.

There is of course no excuse for the lack of control variety/ability to change keys for actions the game has, I too would like to see this implemented and changed. Many have also noticed that the skill-check is a little delayed, I have noticed this since the start and am unsure if it is intentional, if it was then it would make sense due to adding to the difficulty of getting the "perfect" zone and making it harder because the survivors actually scared and delayed, but if it is unintentionally although it is a good "accident" in some cases, many people prefer the easy option and nobody seems to notice that certain games have become too easy and hand-fed to them, the whole point of a feature like that would be to add difficulty or else everybody would be nailing it first time easy boring game, but this way you actually must focus on repairing as well as looking around, adding to the atmosphere and intention of the game. My personal opinion would be to leave this in, it adds difficulty and makes sure the people who want everything hand-fed to them stay away from the game as these are usually the type of people who get put on a hook 2 times in the space of you saving them 10 seconds ago, and expect you to save them again.
This brings me onto my next point which is teamwork. I've seen many reviews complain about lack of teamwork between survivors, however there is nothing FORCING you to be a team player, the developers themselves said you can be a team player or risk it out on your own, there are bonus points/rewards for helping people, but its obviously not compulsory, just like in a real life scenario. (You can also see it in the intro cinematic, a survivors runs past another 1 that is trapped, and refuses to help and carries on running).

All and all this game is great, of course needs some work, but its getting there. I would highly recommend this game especially if you can get a private group of 5 friends with you, its a ton of fun.

If anybody has any further questions or concerns feel free to comment them or message me privately :)

[h1]Read this Review before you buy[/h1]

This game has some really good potental. It is a buy that its cheat at the moment and hopefully will get better once developers get their heads out of their asses and fix some common sense things. The game is geared towards competive play but at the same time it punishes you for wanting to play the game in general due to the massive wait times in lobbies. This is not the main for many players but for those who just play solo and all dont press "Search for Lobby" at the same time you will get paired with randoms who will either quit on you because they didnt  get in their lobby with their friends OR they quit because they think the team is scrub which increases the wait time as a killer by 10 fold [b](average time waiting for a match as killer can be from anywhere from 15 minutes to 50 minutes)[/b]

[h1]Playing as Survivor[/h1]

Playing as survivor is fresh and fun and requires coordination to sucessfully escape, however you [b]CANNOT[/b] communitcate with your team unless you 'purchase' the map using in game currency and use the gold bead item. There is no form of text or voice communication when you are near other players which I find [b]Very Dissapointing[/b] for an online title. Sure you can communicate at the lobby but its only for survivors and 80% of the time no one stays long enough to formulate a plan. As of the current release build the only meta to win or play the game as survivors is to gain the self sustaining perks that allow you heal and sabotage without the item.

Most 'Expendables' labeled offerings are very miniscue and do not aid the survivors much other then the pure darkness offering which leaves all other items useless (even the score booster ones) The only way to escape the killer is to toss objects in his way or meta around him using cheap tactics that are honestly cheating in my opinion. Constantly vaulting around windows and kiting the killer while playing to god that your teammates are fixing generators (which 9 times out of 10 their not).

[h1] Playing as the Killer[/h1]

Everyone plays the killer, there are so manny killer started lobbies that sometimes wait times to find a lobby that will actually stay and is not trying to random into a friends lobby will take the killer [b] 15 to even 50 minutes to locate a match[/b] and even when you have enough players theres always 1 person who disconnects from the game and ruins it for everyone becuase when they leave it causes every player to 'de-rank' and reduce their overall ranking which makes people NOT want to play. Alot of killer mechanics are very good and a majority of them are really bad, for example anytime a player sprints and performs an action he can be seen by a killer through a form of sonar. this prevents Call of Duty style hit and run tactics and requires players to walk around and play stealth. Common meta for the killers is to play Chuckles (Trapper) or the HIllbilly because they have the ability to one hit down the players with no concenquence.

[h1] Reccomendations to the developers before I offer my full support[/h1]

[olist]
    [*]Allow friends to play with eachother in ranked matches, even if its 2 friends maximum at least theres some form of teaming up so there can be competive play.
    [*]UNless the Entity causes everyone to be mute why can players not communicate with eachother in area chat or some type of communication. There needs to be some form of communication allowed otherwise this game will die fast.
    [*]Penalize players who quit the game and offer bonuses for the survivors when they quit such as a certain percentage of repair/sabotage boost for example 1% = 1 Disconnect 2% = 2 Disconnects etc. If the Killer quits then the game should be a draw and no rank and a fraction of points can be earned such as 1/3.
    [*]Add a action cooldown for things such as vaulting and sprinting. more often then not players will just constantly vault the killer and meta them to victory.
    [*]Make kill animations for both front and back of downed chatacters (with the Skull offering for killers) Meta for survivors is to constanstly spin around to prevent insta kills from the killer due to the animation requiring ample space and approach from behind fallen players)
    [*]Increase the chance of coming unhooked from the altars for non basement hooks. IF the killer takes his time to march you down to his hidey hole man cave it shouldent be easy enough to break out of.
    [*]THe Skill check circle has too high of a trigger and more often then not even getting a Great skill check (white bar) will result in cauing noise cause of server/host lag.
[/olist]

Мне некогда бегать за ними и просить вежливо уйти, я хочу посмотреть фильм и попить чайку. Нет же, приходится ловить бухих туристов, и вешать на крючки, что бы протрезвели и в капканы не угодили. Так еще что удумали, генераторы мои старые на цвет мет, видимо, разбирать. Да им же 30 с лишним лет! Как дед помер, так к ним никто и не подходил, это же опасно! Я как то залез в один такой, теперь не рожа - а месиво. Проще новый купить. Так эти, черт бы их побрал, лезут, их прогонишь - опять бегут. Даже не слушают, носятся, орут, в туалете прячутся, прямо перед носом деревянные щиты кидают, все ноги отдавили. Приходится рукоприкладствовать.. Ну а что сделаешь? По-другому же не понимают. Нда.. Опять, кажется, вандалы, залезли. Слышу кто-то в сундуке роется, пойду посмотрю..

This game is awesome if your a horror movie/game fan. Fair price.

Judging by some other reviews, it seems like people are buying this expecting a team-based eSport. Do not buy if you're trying to gold medal at the horror game olympics. There is no horror game olympics.

7.5/10
Pros 
-good fun with friends 
-simple

Cons
-heaps of bugs and issyes such as disconnects,glitches,getting frozen,crashes, heaps
-ranking system is forever worse than beta
-you need 5 people to start
-match making is awful
-repititive
-camper killers
-much much more
Despite all these many many issues, its still a fun game. It does get a little annoying often though
有简中了大赞！平衡性还是有待提高啊，这个版本屠夫太强了
Il gioco è stupendo ogni partita è diversa se solo mettessero la coop con gli amici sarebbe WOW per ora ni.
